source.title: How Clerk works
source.description: Clerk architecture: Frontend API (FAPI), Backend API (BAPI), abstraction levels (prebuilt components, Clerk Elements, custom flows), hybrid authentication with `__client` and `__session` cookies, 60-second token refresh, handshake flow for SSR.

source.title: Clerk: Core concepts
source.description: Integration options: Account Portal, prebuilt components, custom API flows. Key SDK objects: `Clerk`, `Client`, `Session`, `User`, `Organization`, `SignIn`, `SignUp`. Session tokens as JWTs for backend authentication.

source.title: SDK Reference: Clerk Next.js SDK
source.description: `@clerk/nextjs` SDK overview: `clerkMiddleware()` integration, React hooks (`useUser()`, `useAuth()`, `useOrganization()`, billing hooks), App Router helpers (`auth()`, `currentUser()`), Pages Router helpers (`getAuth()`, `buildClerkProps()`), `clerkClient` backend API, `Auth` object.

source.title: Next.js Quickstart (App Router)
source.description: Next.js App Router quickstart: `@clerk/nextjs` installation, `clerkMiddleware()` in `middleware.ts`, `<ClerkProvider>` wrapper, prebuilt components `<SignInButton>`, `<SignUpButton>`, `<SignedIn>`, `<SignedOut>`, `<UserButton>` for authentication UI.

source.title: Development: Clerk environment variables
source.description: Environment variables reference: `CLERK_SIGN_IN_URL`, `CLERK_SIGN_UP_URL`, `CLERK_SIGN_IN_FORCE_REDIRECT_URL`, `CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY`, `CLERK_SECRET_KEY`, `CLERK_JWT_KEY`, satellite domain settings, webhook signing secrets, telemetry options, Next.js `NEXT_PUBLIC_` variants.

source.title: Development: Install Clerk with shadcn/ui CLI
source.description: shadcn/ui CLI Clerk integration: `npx shadcn@latest add @clerk/nextjs-quickstart` for complete setup, individual `@clerk/nextjs-sign-in-page`, `@clerk/nextjs-sign-up-page`, `@clerk/nextjs-waitlist-page` packages, `<ClerkProvider>` component, middleware installation.

source.title: Authentication flows: Sign-up and sign-in options
source.description: Email verification codes/links, phone/SMS OTP with SMS allowlists, username, password, passkeys with WebAuthn domain restrictions, SSO OAuth and Enterprise connections, Web3 MetaMask/Coinbase/OKX wallets, MFA TOTP/SMS/backup codes, user restrictions.

source.title: Authentication flows: Customize your redirect URLs
source.description: Post-authentication redirect configuration using environment variables `CLERK_SIGN_IN_FORCE_REDIRECT_URL`, `CLERK_SIGN_UP_FALLBACK_REDIRECT_URL` and component props `fallbackRedirectUrl`, `forceRedirectUrl`, `signInFallbackRedirectUrl`, `signUpForceRedirectUrl` on `<SignIn>`, `<SignUp>`, `<ClerkProvider>`, `<RedirectToSignIn>`.

source.title: Securing your app: Legal compliance
source.description: Dashboard setting for requiring express consent to terms of service or privacy policy during sign-up via `<SignUp>` component or Account Portal checkbox.

source.title: Session management: Session tokens
source.description: Session token JWT default claims `azp`, `exp`, `fva`, `iat`, `iss`, `sid`, `sub`. Organisation claim `o` with role/permission bitmask `o.fpm`. Actor claim `act` for impersonation. 4KB cookie limits, custom claims.

source.title: User management: Users
source.description: `User` object with identifiers (email, phone, username), `publicMetadata`, `privateMetadata`. Dashboard and programmatic management. Frontend components `<UserButton>`, `<UserProfile>` and React hooks. Backend SDK `clerkClient` methods `createUser()`, `getUser()`, `deleteUser()`.

source.title: Read session and user data in your Next.js app with Clerk
source.description: Next.js session and user data helpers. App Router: `auth()`, `currentUser()`. Pages Router: `getAuth()`, `clerkClient()`, `buildClerkProps()`. Client hooks `useAuth()` for session state and `useUser()` for `User` object. Route protection patterns.

source.title: Component Reference
source.description: Clerk component library: authentication (`<SignIn />`, `<SignUp />`), user (`<UserButton />`, `<UserProfile />`), organisation, billing (`<PricingTable />`), control (`<SignedIn />`, `<Protect />`), unstyled buttons, redirect components, and `appearance` customisation.

source.title: <SignIn /> component
source.description: `<SignIn />` component reference: `fallbackRedirectUrl`, `forceRedirectUrl` redirect props, `routing` strategies, `oauthFlow` modes, `initialValues` prefilling, `transferable` sign-ins, `waitlistUrl`, `withSignUp` unified flow, and `appearance` styling.

source.title: <SignUp /> component
source.description: `<SignUp />` component reference: `fallbackRedirectUrl`, `forceRedirectUrl` redirect props, `routing` strategies, `oauthFlow` modes, `initialValues` prefilling, `unsafeMetadata` for custom user data, `signInUrl` linking, and `appearance` styling.

source.title: <GoogleOneTap /> component
source.description: `<GoogleOneTap />` component for Google One Tap authentication: `signInForceRedirectUrl`, `signUpForceRedirectUrl` props, `itpSupport` for Safari/iOS, `fedCmSupport` for FedCM API, `cancelOnTapOutside`, and known limitations.

source.title: <UserButton /> component
source.description: `<UserButton />` component rendering avatar dropdown menu: `userProfileMode` (modal/navigation), `afterSwitchSessionUrl` for multi-session, `showName`, `userProfileProps`, `signInUrl`, custom menu actions via `UserButton.Action` and `UserButton.Link`.

source.title: <UserProfile /> component
source.description: `<UserProfile />` component for full account management UI: `routing` strategies, `path` mounting, `additionalOAuthScopes` per provider, `customPages` array, `appearance` styling, custom sidenav pages via `UserProfile.Page` and links.

source.title: <Protect>
source.description: `<Protect />` component for authentication and authorisation: `role`, `permission`, `plan`, `feature` props for access control, `condition` prop with `has()` function for complex logic, `fallback` UI, client-side and server-side rendering.

source.title: Appearance prop
source.description: `appearance` prop for styling Clerk components: `theme` baseTheme property, `layout` prop, `variables` prop, `elements` targeting with CSS classes (`cl-` prefix), Tailwind `cssLayerName` integration, CSS modules, inline styles.

source.title: Themes
source.description: `@clerk/themes` package with `dark`, `simple`, `shadcn`, `shadesOfPurple`, `neobrutalism` prebuilt themes. Apply globally via `ClerkProvider` or per-component, stack multiple themes, customise with `variables` property.

source.title: Variables prop
source.description: `variables` property for theming Clerk components: `colorPrimary`, `colorDanger`, `colorSuccess`, `colorWarning`, `colorNeutral`, `colorForeground`, `colorBackground`, `colorInput`, `colorBorder`, `fontFamily`, `fontSize`, `fontWeight`, `borderRadius`, `spacing` and CSS variable equivalents `--clerk-color-*`.

source.title: Layout prop
source.description: `layout` property for `<SignIn />` and `<SignUp />` components: `animations` toggle, `logoImageUrl`, `logoPlacement`, `logoLinkUrl`, `socialButtonsPlacement`, `socialButtonsVariant`, `showOptionalFields`, `termsPageUrl`, `privacyPageUrl`, `helpPageUrl`, `shimmer` effects, `unsafe_disableDevelopmentModeWarnings`.

source.title: captcha prop
source.description: `captcha` property for Cloudflare Turnstile CAPTCHA widget appearance: `theme` options (`auto`, `light`, `dark`), `size` variants (`normal`, `flexible`, `compact`), `language`/locale settings via `appearance.captcha` on `ClerkProvider`.

source.title: Customizing Clerk: Account Portal overview
source.description: Account Portal hosted pages for sign-in, sign-up, user profile, organisation profile, create organisation, waitlist. URL structure `accounts.domain.com`, `redirect_url` query parameter, fallback redirects, disabling portal, `<RedirectToSignIn />` and `<RedirectToSignUp />` control components.

source.title: Add custom items and links to the <UserButton /> component
source.description: `<UserButton />` menu customisation with `<UserButton.Action>` for `onClick` handlers, `<UserButton.Link>` for `href` navigation, `<UserButton.MenuItems>` container, `<UserButton.UserProfilePage>` for custom pages, reordering `manageAccount` and `signOut`, conditional rendering with `has()` permissions.

source.title: Add custom pages and links to the <UserProfile /> component
source.description: Customising `<UserProfile />` sidenav with `<UserButton.UserProfilePage />`, `<UserProfile.Page />`, `<UserButton.UserProfileLink />`, `<UserProfile.Link />` child components, required props (`label`, `labelIcon`, `url`, `children`), reordering default `account` and `security` routes.

source.title: Add custom pages and links to the <OrganizationProfile /> component
source.description: Customising `<OrganizationProfile />` sidenav with `<OrganizationSwitcher.OrganizationProfilePage />`, `<OrganizationProfile.Page />`, `<OrganizationSwitcher.OrganizationProfileLink />`, `<OrganizationProfile.Link />` child components, required props (`label`, `labelIcon`, `url`, `children`), reordering default `members` and `general` routes.

source.title: Build your own sign-in-or-up page for your Next.js app with Clerk
source.description: Custom sign-in-or-up page using `<SignIn />` component with Next.js `[[...sign-in]]` catch-all routes, `clerkMiddleware()` with `createRouteMatcher()` for public routes, `CLERK_SIGN_IN_URL` and fallback redirect environment variables.

source.title: Build your own sign-up page for your Next.js app with Clerk
source.description: Dedicated sign-up page using `<SignUp />` component with Next.js `[[...sign-up]]` catch-all routes, `clerkMiddleware()` with `createRouteMatcher()` for public routes, `CLERK_SIGN_UP_URL` and fallback redirect environment variables.

source.title: Customizing Clerk: shadcn/ui
source.description: Clerk Elements with shadcn/ui integration: complete sign-in and sign-up flow examples using `@clerk/elements`, `SignIn.Root`, `SignUp.Root`, `Clerk.Connection` for OAuth, `Clerk.Input type="otp"` custom render, multi-step authentication, loading states.

source.title: Development: Testing
source.description: Testing overview: fake OTP emails/phones with `+clerk_test` and 555 numbers, Backend API session token creation and refresh, Testing Tokens via `__clerk_testing_token` query parameter for bypassing bot detection, Playwright/Cypress support.

source.title: Development: Test emails and phones
source.description: Test mode OTP simulation: `+clerk_test` email subaddresses, fictional `555` phone numbers (`+1 XXX 555-0100` to `555-0199`), fixed verification code `424242`, development instance monthly limits, `useSignIn()`/`useSignUp()` code examples.

source.title: Development: Testing with Playwright
source.description: Playwright E2E testing with `@clerk/testing` package: `clerkSetup()` in global setup, `setupClerkTestingToken()` for individual tests, `CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY`/`CLERK_SECRET_KEY` configuration, Testing Tokens for bypassing bot detection.

source.title: Customizing Clerk: Localization prop (experimental)
source.description: Localising Clerk components via `ClerkProvider` `localization` prop: `@clerk/localizations` package with predefined translations (`frFR`, `enGB`, etc.), custom localisation objects, finding localisation keys, `unstable__errors` for custom error messages.

source.title: <ClerkProvider>
source.description: `<ClerkProvider>` component reference: session/user context, redirect props (`signInFallbackRedirectUrl`, `signUpForceRedirectUrl`), `appearance` and `localization` props, satellite app configuration, `allowedRedirectOrigins` security, CSP `nonce`, `telemetry`, Next.js `dynamic` prop.

source.title: SDK Reference: User object
source.description: Frontend `User` object properties: `emailAddresses`, `phoneNumbers`, `externalAccounts`, `passkeys`, `web3Wallets`, `publicMetadata`, `unsafeMetadata`, `organizationMemberships`. Methods: `createEmailAddress()`, `createPhoneNumber()`, `createExternalAccount()`, `createPasskey()`, `createTOTP()`, `verifyTOTP()`, `createBackupCode()`, `updatePassword()`, `update()`, `setProfileImage()`.
